snippet.title: BIRD CLIMB by BoomBit Games | iOS App (iPhone, iPad) | Android Video Gameplay‬
snippet.description:
App Store::     https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/bird-climb/id1045926023?mt=8
Google Play:  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.boombit.BirdsClimbingGame&hl=en
Windows:      https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/apps/bird-climb/9nblggh2mf0w
Amazon:        http://www.amazon.com/BoomBit-Bird-Climb/dp/B00ZUJEL8I



Bird Climb is a simple one touch Multiplayer Arcade game that is impossible to put down. Challenge your friends to play this fun & addictive game and beat their score.

Tap to fly your Bird to the top and avoid the spikes. The faster you tap, the quicker the bird flies. Collect precious gems on your way to unlock fantastic new characters!

You can invite and play with all your friends in online Multiplayer mode and have multiple battles and challenges open at the same time.

Play to compete and win a place at the top of your Friends & Global Ranks.

How fast are your reaction skills? This fun and fast paced arcade game will test you to the max.

Features:

• Free To Play
• Simple 1 Touch Controls
• Online Multiplayer
• Play With Friends
• 2 Difficulty Modes – Easy & Normal
• Beautiful Minimal Art Style
• Leaderboards and Achievements
• Cloud Save
• Android TV Support (coming soon)
• Game Pad Support (coming soon)
